snippet: William C. Thompson Jr. ran a strong race for New York City mayor in 2009, but his current fund-raising lag and his low-key style may hurt him in 2013.
abstract: Former comptroller William C Thompson Jr ran a strong race for New York City mayor in 2009, but his current fund-raising lag and his low-key campaign style have left many wondering if he can compete against a handful of extremely ambitious politicians in 2013.
lead_paragraph: William C. Thompson Jr. ran a strong race for New York City mayor in 2009, but his current fund-raising lag and his low-key style may hurt him in 2013.

headline.seo: William C. Thompson Jr. Has Slow Start in Mayoral Race
headline.main: Mayoral Hopeful’s Slow Start Has Some Asking if His Heart Is in It
headline.print_headline: Mayoral Hopeful’s Slow Start Has Some Asking if His Heart Is in It
